body: is it possible to have 2 TS accounts? Because right now, I'm just letting my sister use it and let her change the nickname.
body_tagged: is it possible to have 2 TS accounts? Because right now, I'm just letting my sister use it and let her change the nickname.
title: TS Question

replies.body: It doesn't really matter since you can always change your nickname in TS. Anyway, I don't think you can have 2 separate accounts for TS. It has to be on separate computers.
replies.body_tagged: It doesn't really matter since you can always change your nickname in TS. Anyway, I don't think you can have 2 separate accounts for TS. It has to be on separate computers.

replies.body: Are you asking if it is possible to have 2 accounts on the same computer?
replies.body_tagged: Are you asking if it is possible to have 2 accounts on the same computer?

replies.body:
I know, but I have the gold rank and the premium suite. Will I get into trouble if nuclear uses it?
 Nuclear doesn't have gold
replies.body_tagged:
I know, but I have the gold rank and the premium suite. Will I get into trouble if nuclear uses it?

reply_to.body: It doesn't really matter since you can always change your nickname in TS. Anyway, I don't think you can have 2 separate accounts for TS. It has to be on separate computers.

replies.body: To be safe, I suggest Ducky uses her own computer.
replies.body_tagged: To be safe, I suggest Ducky uses her own computer.

replies.body: It's possible, go to Settings, then Identities and create a new identity. When you connect to the Avicus TeamSpeak, make sure you have the correct IP, and you can choose your identity to connect with to it by clicking the dropbox tab in the connection box.
replies.body_tagged: It's possible, go to Settings, then Identities and create a new identity. When you connect to the Avicus TeamSpeak, make sure you have the correct IP, and you can choose your identity to connect with to it by clicking the dropbox tab in the connection box.
